data.text: @JennieB98638569 Of today's deaths, 1 was in their 30s, 2 in their 40s & 2 in their 60s
@mountainash04 It is very sad!! . . . I feel so sorry for the families 🙏
@Mirella_PhD Thanks for the explanation Mirella. The high death numbers are overwhelmingly sad.

@mountainash04 No, they don't tally with ICU . . . according to an explanation I read from an end of life Dr, when such cases deteriorate with death expected, they are often placed in hospice or other palliative care treatment and made as comfortable as possible
@Mirella_PhD Do the deaths tally with the numbers in ICU? I'm not quite following the why and how of so many deaths when so few are in ICU now.
@Mirella_PhD Prayers to all who have lost their lives and their families! 🙏💝
